name: Captain Munch and the Curse of Navy Jeans
name_original: Captain Munch and the Curse of Navy Jeans
description:
Avast ye, gamers!

Embark on what may be the strangest nautical adventure, featuring the binnacle- I mean pinnacle of storytelling!

Join Captain Munch, First Mate, Short Mortimer Golding, and Henry the Parrot as they search for booty in the Amnesia Diamond. Defeat the guardians of the four Diamond Plates in whatever order you wish before taking on the final obstacles to this voyage.

WARNING: This game is rated R, matey. It sucks and is unfit for all audiences. Seriously, this whole thing is yo-ho-ho and a bottle of dumb.
